t: Jahabow Industries, 1004 Industrial Dr, Owensville, MO 65066, US - MapQuest
s: Jahabow Industries provides glass, wood and metal display cases and store fixture solutions. It partners with a wide variety of leading retailers and brand marketers throughout the United States. The company designs, manufactures and installs custom-crafted solutions.

Jahabow is a manufacturer of commercial grade retail display cases. We carry a variety of standard sizes, or can design and build to almost any custom specification. Our display cases set the standard for the industry and are engineered to withstand decades of heavy commercial use.

t: Jahabow Industries, Inc. - Crunchbase Company Profile & Funding
s: Jahabow Industries is a retail solutions manufacturer. They build commercial-grade retail display cases and millwork decors. Their retail display cases are suitable for usage in a variety of retail channels, including jewelry, luxury, pawn, athletic goods, cannabis, and others.
